itemInfo.itemDesc:
A desert dumpling made with the finest dough. 

- Unique Effect: Max Stamina +200 for 75 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Cinnamon
item.desc: Cinnamon is a specialty of Mediah.\nUsage: Borscht, Desert Dumpling, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at Kasula Farm. Mediah Cinammon can also be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

item.name: Lizard Meat
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a lizard corpse.

item.name: Wheat Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Wheat Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Cinnamon
item.desc: Cinnamon is a specialty of Mediah.\nUsage: Borscht, Desert Dumpling, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at Kasula Farm. Mediah Cinammon can also be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

item.name: Olive Oil
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.
